caption.p: Number of nanoencapsulation, nanoemulsion, nanoparticle, and nanotechnology publications per year in the Scopus database using the following keywords: a nanoencapsulation, nanoemulsion, nanoparticle, and nanotechnology; b nanoencapsulation and oil, nanoemulsion and oil, nanoparticle and oil, and nanotechnology and oil; and c nanoencapsulation and food and oil, nanoemulsion and food and oil, nanoparticle and food and oil, and nanotechnology and food and oil
